attributes.review: this app took a total of 420 hours to download and when it finally worked it made my phone freeze and stole all my information and all of a sudden my dog pooped 69 times. to my fellow trumpies, this app is not worth it no matter what. it called me racist homophobic slurs and told me to leave america if i don’t like it here! i demand LAW AND ORDER!!!! this is not good please delete now!!!!!! ✨trump 2020✨on a gravestone😜🧚
attributes.title: disgusting worst app ever

attributes.review: At first I was very excited to download this app but I was SOOOOOOOOO WRONG. First of all this app took a WHOLE DAY to download. It did that thing where it was on 99 percent for 10 hours. Then it asked me for all of this personal information like my debit card number, social security, names of my kids. I was getting so concerned!!! Then after doing some research I heard that this app sells you personal data to black market buyers to steal your identity!!! I IMMEDIATELY deleted the app, called my bank to make sure there was no suspicious activity on my account, and checked on my children. But then I started getting spam phone calls every single day after I deleted the app!! I had to change my phone number because of it!! NEVER EVER download this app. IT WILL STEAL YOUR DATA !!!!
attributes.title: Do not download!!! Steals data!!!

attributes.review: Yeah I downloaded it and it kept giving me fake and uneducated information

attributes.review: So this app took forever to download. I just wanted to keep up with the COVID-19 news and the BLM Movement, but all this app did was destroy my phone. I couldn’t open any of my other apps and I constantly found random photos in my gallery. I don’t see this app as a very helpful app. Please don’t download. This is my warning to you for your sake. ❤️ stay safe out there!

The quality is bad, takes forever to load, and won’t let me click on anything!!! I’m so disappointed in my daddy trump and this app! If I could rate it 0 I would 💔
